element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm converts rectangular coordinates to polar ones. This can be used to prepare cost layer to be used with the anisotropic cost algorithm, since it requires layer in that format (a maximum cost layer and a maximum cost direction one)

element.name: X
element.text: The layer contaning the X component of a vector

element.name: Y
element.text: The layer contaning the X component of a vector

element.name: ANGLE
element.text: The resulting layer containing the angle of the vector obtained after converting X and Y values at the given cell to polar coordinates.

element.name: DIST
element.text: The resulting layer containing the distance (modulus) of the vector obtained after converting X and Y values at the given cell to polar coordinates.
